empty.connectDescription: Connect to your tldw server in Settings to send messages and view media. After connecting, you can review media and notes here.
empty.connectExample1: Open Settings → tldw server to add your server URL.
empty.connectExample2: Once connected, browse media and notes, then generate structured reviews and summaries.
empty.demoDescription: This demo shows how tldw Assistant can turn media and notes into structured reviews. Connect your own server later to analyze your own content.
empty.demoExample1: See how selected media and notes appear in the review workspace.
empty.demoExample2: When you connect, you’ll be able to generate summaries and action items from your own recordings and notes.

reviewPage.selectItemEmpty: Select an item to review and analyze
reviewPage.selectMediaEmpty: Select a media item to view analyses
reviewPage.autoReviewLabel: Automatically generate a review when you select an item
reviewPage.mediaModeHint: Search and inspect one media item at a time. Select a result to view its content and analyses on the right.
reviewPage.resultsHelp: Keyboard: Tab into the results list, use Enter or Space to select the focused row, then use the Prev/Next buttons in the analysis toolbar to move between items.
reviewPage.reviewHint: Ask the assistant to review this item.
reviewPage.attachGeneratedHint: Run the assistant and attach the result to this media item.
reviewPage.saveGeneratedNoteHint: Run the assistant and save the result as a note.
reviewPage.saveToMediaHint: Attach the current text in the editor to this media item.
reviewPage.saveAnalysisHint: Create a note from the current analysis.
reviewPage.resultsHint: Click a result to load its content and analyses on the right.
reviewPage.paginationHint: Use filters or pagination to refine the results if many items are loaded.
reviewPage.offlineHint: Connect to your tldw server in Settings to send messages and view media. Then you can search media from this page.
reviewPage.chatWithMediaHint: Open Chat and prefill the composer with this media’s content.
reviewPage.chatPrepared: Prepared chat with this media in the composer.
reviewPage.chatAboutMediaHint: Open RAG chat scoped to this media only.
reviewPage.chatAboutMediaInvalidId: This media item does not have a numeric id yet.
reviewPage.analysisEditorPlaceholder: Run Review or Summarize, then edit here...
reviewPage.undoRolledBack: Undo: rolled back to deleted version
reviewPage.noSavedAnalyses: No saved analyses for this item yet.

mediaEmpty.demoDescription: This demo shows how tldw Assistant can display and inspect processed media. Connect your own server later to browse your own recordings and documents.
mediaEmpty.demoExample1: See how processed media items appear in the Media viewer.
mediaEmpty.demoExample2: When you connect, you’ll be able to browse and inspect media ingested from your own recordings and files.
mediaEmpty.demoExample3: Use Media together with Review to summarize or analyze recordings.
mediaEmpty.connectDescription: Connect to your tldw server in Settings to send messages and view media. After connecting, processed recordings and documents will be listed here.
mediaEmpty.connectExample1: Open Settings → tldw server to add your server URL.
mediaEmpty.connectExample2: Once connected, use Quick ingest in the header to add media from your own recordings and files.
mediaEmpty.offlineTitle: Media Review isn’t available on this server yet
mediaEmpty.offlineDescription: This workspace depends on Media Review support in your tldw server. You can continue using chat, notes, and other tools while you upgrade to a version that includes Media.
mediaEmpty.offlineExample1: Open Diagnostics to confirm your server version and available APIs.
mediaEmpty.offlineExample2: After upgrading, reload the extension and return to Media.
mediaEmpty.offlineTechnicalDetails: Technical details: this tldw server does not advertise the Media endpoints (for example, /api/v1/media and /api/v1/media/search).

mediaPage.spreadModeTooltip: View selected items side-by-side for comparison
mediaPage.listModeTooltip: View one item at a time with navigation
mediaPage.allModeTooltip: View all selected items in a scrollable list
mediaPage.firstUseStep1Desc: Click items in the left panel to add them to your viewer.
mediaPage.firstUseStep2Desc: Use "Compare" for side-by-side, "Focus" for one at a time, or "Stack" to see all.
mediaPage.firstUseStep3Desc: Use Prev/Next buttons or keyboard (Tab + Enter) to move through items.
mediaPage.resultsHint: Click to stack, Shift+click for range
mediaPage.paginationHint: Use pagination or open all visible items
mediaPage.selectItemsHint: Select items on the left to view here.
mediaPage.openAllCapped: Showing first {{count}} items to keep things smooth
mediaPage.filterHelp: Search matches title and content; Types and Keywords further narrow the results.
mediaPage.noResults: No media found. Use Quick ingest in the header to add media from your recordings and files.
mediaPage.keywordHelper: Keywords help you find this media using the keyword filter on the left.
mediaPage.modeHint: Search and stack multiple media items to compare them in the viewer on the right.
mediaPage.noSelectionDescription: Select a media item from the left sidebar to view its content and analyses here.
mediaPage.deleteItemConfirm: Delete this item? This cannot be undone.
mediaPage.noteDeleteNeedsReload: Unable to delete note. Reload and try again.
mediaPage.userPrefixPlaceholder: Optional: Enter text to prepend before the media content...
mediaPage.viewerHelp: Keyboard: j/k to navigate items, o to toggle expand, Escape to clear selection. Tab into results list, Enter/Space to stack items. Shift+click for range selection.

trashPage.title: Trash
trashPage.subtitle: Items moved to trash stay here until you restore or permanently delete them.
trashPage.emptyDescription: Deleted media items show up here until you restore them or delete them permanently.
trashPage.deleteSelectedConfirm_one: Permanently delete {{count}} item? This cannot be undone.
trashPage.deleteSelectedConfirm_other: Permanently delete {{count}} items? This cannot be undone.
trashPage.emptyTrashConfirm: Permanently delete all items in trash? This cannot be undone.
trashPage.deletePermanentConfirm: Permanently delete this item? This cannot be undone.

reviewNavigationFailed: Couldn't open Content Review. Please try again.

contentReview.title: Content Review
contentReview.emptyDescription: No drafts yet. Use Quick Ingest with Review before saving to create drafts.
contentReview.reviewBeforeStorageHint: Process now, then edit drafts locally before committing to your server.
contentReview.reviewWarningBody: Drafts are saved in this browser and may include sensitive data. You can clear drafts from the Content Review page at any time.
contentReview.reviewWarningBodySecondary: Review mode keeps content client-side until you commit it to your server.
contentReview.reviewStorageCapWarning_one: {{count}} file exceeds the local draft cap ({{cap}}). Attach sources before committing audio/video.
contentReview.reviewStorageCapWarning_other: {{count}} files exceed the local draft cap ({{cap}}). Attach sources before committing audio/video.
contentReview.selectDraft: Select a draft to begin reviewing.
contentReview.resetBody: This will restore the original content for this draft.
contentReview.aiHint: Sends draft content to your server for AI processing.
contentReview.aiConsentBody: This will send the draft content to your tldw server for AI processing. Drafts stay local until you commit.
contentReview.detectSectionsBody: This will replace existing sections and reset your selections.

transcript_clean.label: Clean transcript
transcript_clean.description: Normalize punctuation and casing while preserving line structure.

speaker_turns.label: Speaker turns
speaker_turns.description: Ensure each speaker turn is on its own line with clear labels.

chapter_headings.label: Chapter headings
chapter_headings.description: Insert Markdown headings to group topics without removing content.

contentReview.missingSourceBody: Attach the original file to commit this draft.
contentReview.commitDisabled: Attach the original audio/video file before committing.
contentReview.discardBody: This draft will be marked as discarded and removed from review.
contentReview.commitAllBody: Only drafts marked as reviewed will be committed.
contentReview.storageCapWarning: This file exceeds the local draft cap ({{cap}}).
contentReview.clearBody: This removes all local content review drafts and assets.
